mapper.select: SELECT TB_OPTION_TYPE.TY_CD "tyCd" ,TB_OPTION.OPT_CD "optCd" ,TB_OPTION.OPT_NM "optNm" FROM TB_OPTION_TYPE INNER JOIN TB_OPTION ON TB_OPTION_TYPE.TY_CD = TB_OPTION.TY_CD INNER JOIN TB_ITEM ON TB_OPTION_TYPE.IT_CD = TB_ITEM.IT_CD INNER JOIN TB_CART ON TB_ITEM.IT_CD = TB_CART.IT_CD WHERE TB_CART.CART_CD = #{cartCd}

SELECT TB_OPTION_TYPE.IT_CD "IT_CD" ,TB_OPTION_TYPE.TY_CD "TY_CD" ,TB_OPTION.OPT_CD "OPT_CD" ,TB_OPTION.OPT_NM "OPT_NM" FROM TB_OPTION_TYPE INNER JOIN TB_OPTION ON TB_OPTION_TYPE.TY_CD = TB_OPTION.TY_CD INNER JOIN TB_ITEM ON TB_OPTION_TYPE.IT_CD = TB_ITEM.IT_CD WHERE TB_OPTION_TYPE.IT_CD = #{itCd} OR TB_OPTION.OPT_CD IS NULL

SELECT TB_CART.CART_CD "cartCd" ,TB_ITEM.IT_CD "itCd" ,TB_ITEM.IT_NM "itNm" ,TB_ITEM.IMG_CD "imgCd" ,TB_ITEM.PRICE "price" ,TB_CART.AMOUNT "amount" ,TB_CART.MB_ID "mbId" ,TB_OPTION.OPT_CD "optCd" ,TB_OPTION.OPT_NM "optNm" FROM TB_CART TB_CART INNER JOIN TB_ITEM TB_ITEM ON TB_CART.IT_CD = TB_ITEM.IT_CD INNER JOIN TB_OPTION TB_OPTION ON TB_CART.OPT_CD = TB_OPTION.OPT_CD WHERE MB_ID = #{mbId}

SELECT TB_CART.CART_CD "CART_CD" ,TB_ITEM.IT_CD "IT_CD" ,TB_ITEM.IT_NM "IT_NM" ,TB_ITEM.IMG_CD "IMG_CD" ,TB_ITEM.PRICE "PRICE" ,TB_CART.AMOUNT "AMOUNT" ,TB_CART.MB_ID "MB_ID" ,TB_OPTION.OPT_CD "OPT_CD" ,TB_OPTION.OPT_NM "OPT_NM" FROM TB_CART TB_CART INNER JOIN TB_ITEM TB_ITEM ON TB_CART.IT_CD = TB_ITEM.IT_CD LEFT JOIN TB_OPTION TB_OPTION ON TB_CART.OPT_CD = TB_OPTION.OPT_CD WHERE MB_ID = #{mbId} OR TB_CART.OPT_CD IS NULL
